hackathon-description-text: Welcome to the first annual Major League Hacking (MLH) hackathon in Mississippi! The HackState Leadership Team and Mississippi State University are so excited that you’re hacking with us.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best IoT Hack Using a Qualcomm Device
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All team members must be first time hackers.
Team will receive a variety of development books from Big Nerd Ranch.
Seagate Expansion 1TB Portable External Hard Drive USB 3.0
Amazon Echo Dot and a Raspberry Pi 3 Complete Starter Kit - 32 GB

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Product, Technology, Coolness & Ambition, Teamwork & Exploration, and Discretionary
